messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1415
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/6/01 9:59:39 PM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/6/01 9:59:39 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Me too. I got charged for it when my son was born. I told them I could
prove it - that it wasn't done! They took it off the bill. >>


I really dissected my bill too. They charged me a nursery charge for 2
days. DD was w/ me the whole time. I wasn't as successful though they refused
to remove the charge. So I paid them $10 a month for 4 years. I was so pissed.

NICKI~

Pam

OK

NICKI~
